title: Passion fruit soufflé with passion fruit ice cream and lemon shortbread
description: Fill your ice cream and soufflés with passion in this unusual dinner party dessert recipe. You can make the ice cream and lemon shortbread way ahead of time and serve any leftover ice cream or biscuits another time. Equipment and preparation: you will need an ice cream maker, a food processor and cookie cutters in your desired shape for the shortbread.
ingredients: 185g/6½oz plain flour, plus extra for flouring
250g/9oz butter, cut into cubes, plus extra for greasing
1 passion fruit, halved, seeds and pulp scraped out
